OverviewÂ¶

This document describes how to use the IoT camera development board and the built-in camera of the development kit to implement photographing and video recording.

You can perform operations provided in Use Case to learn more about development board peripheral control and then develop devices, such as security cameras.

If you want to view the sample effect first, see Use Case. To customize application behavior, modify the sample code by referring to APIs described in Development Guidelines.

For details about basic concepts for camera development, see the camera development overview.
